Text.Value: What a tease. I can't believe it. Maybe next time...
*The dog sniffs your hand and seems more at ease.*
Leave.
Leave.
*Growl.*
Leave.
Want to play some fetch?
Look, I know you're not going to say it, so you might as well be on your way.
YES! YES! YESSSSS! Amazing. Perfect. No notes.
Ooh... Oh gods... Are they going to say it? What happens if they don't say it...
*Sniff.*
Expose your teeth to the dog and growl.
You're a good dog, Biscotti.
...Sit? Really? No.
YES! OH GOODNESS YES! I am a good dog... Fantastic stuff.
Good dog.
Offer your hand to the dog to sniff, being careful to not spook it.
No, that just won't do.
*Bark!*
You can come back. I like you.
Leave.
I'm a... Oh, goodness! You said it! Wondrous day! I am a good dog.
Sit.
Oh yes, you're lovely. You can come back.
*The dog seems wary, sniffing you intently.*
...Fetch? Oh gods. No no no no...
Ohohohoho... Here we go, here it comes...
Who's a good dog? You're a good dog.
*Growl.*
*Bark!*

Synopsis: Dibbs dog knows a war is brewing, and is always vigilant, to keep his masters safe.
